quotes.quote: It's not about money or connectionsâ€”it's the willingness to out work and outlearn everyone...And if it fails, you learn from what happened and do a better job next time.

Without pain, there would be no suffering, without suffering we would never learn from our mistakes. To make it right, pain and suffering is the key to all windows, without it, there is no way of life.
Become addicted to constant and never-ending self-improvement.
You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
Hope is a waking dream.
If you always do what you've always done, you'll always be where you've always been.
We all need people who will give us feedback. That's how we improve.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
A proud man is always looking down on things and people; and, of course, as long as you are looking down, you cannot see something that is above you.
The time is now.Â Stop hitting the snooze button on your life.
It is not as much about who you used to, as it is about who you choose to be.
You're either green and growing or you're ripe and rotting.
Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination.
We dream to give ourselves hope. To stop dreaming â€“ well, that's like saying you can never change your fate.
Do your best, and be a little better than you are.
When you see a good person, think of becoming like her/him. When you see someone not so good, reflect on your own weak points.
The dreaming has to be backed up by the doing.
No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you've come from, you can always change, become a better version of yourself.
Change equals self-improvement. Push yourself to places you haven't been before.

When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
Excellence is not a destination; it is a continuous journey that never ends.
Be so busy improving yourself that you have no time to criticize others.
We need to accept that we won't always make the right decisions, that we'll screw up royally sometimesâ€“understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.
Change is your friendÂ not your foe; change is a brilliant opportunity to grow.
Self-knowledge is the beginning of self-improvement.
Don't you dare underestimate the power of your own instinct.
The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change.
The very least you can do in your life is figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope. Not admire it from a distance but live right in it, under its roof.
Hope begins in the dark, the stubborn hope that if you just show up and try to do the right thing, the dawn will come.
Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
The key to happinessÂ is really progress and growth and constantly working on yourself and developing something.

The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don't wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope.

We can each define ambition and progress for ourselves. The goal is to work toward a world where expectations are not set by the stereotypes that hold us back, but by our personal passion, talents, and interests.
Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
Beginning today, set an intention and a relentless focus on living your life as the greatest person you can be, in all situations.
Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
Hold fast to dreams,Â For if dreams die,Â Life is a broken-winged bird,Â That cannot fly.
Those who seek a better life must first become a better person.
The most terrifying thing is to accept oneself completely
Growth is actually contagious, so if you want to reach your goals, you've got to get around people who are going in the same direction you want to be going, and you will catch the success.
Don't compare yourself to others. Compare yourself to the person from yesterday.
Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
Work on yourself more than you do on your job.
Work harder than everybody. You're not going to get it by whining, and you're not going to get it by shouting, and you're not going to get it by quitting. You're going to get it by being there.
